name: Cosmic Trooper Eddie Passive T3
passiveSkills: Grants +50% increase to all stats in battle
Immune to Doom, Dark Ghost, Apparition and all Stat Reduction effects

Remove All Negative Effects, including Silver and Unblockable effects, from self and become Immune to Damage and All Negative Effects, including Silver and Unblockable effects, for 3 turns when you reach 1 HP for the first time in battle
Deal 6 hits of Additional True Damage to random enemies equal to 66% of your MISSING HP after every action
This Talisman's effects only activates when equipped to the Trooper Eddie, Battlefield Trooper Eddie, or U.S
